name: apm_sa4_2016_timeseries
title: APM - Timeseries Property Data (SA4) 01/03/1994 - 31/12/2021
keyword: BUILT ENVIRONMENT AND DESIGN,Urban and regional planning,Housing markets, development and management,
abstract:
This dataset describes for sale, for rent listings and sold property data across Australia for the period 01/03/1994 - 31/12/2021. Each data point represents an aggregation of 12 months' worth of data and is reported monthly. It follows the Australian Statistical Geography Standard (ASGS) 2016 Statistical Area Level 4 (SA4) boundaries.

For Sale/For Rent listings are available from 2003 for all states. APM sold data are available from: NSW, SA, QLD, ACT, WA since 1993, auction results in Sydney since 1989, VIC since 1985, NT since 1998 and TAS since 2003.

AURIN has spatially enabled the original data.

selectedAttributes.name: for_rent_home_lease_averageprice
selectedAttributes.title: Average Price (Rental)
selectedAttributes.description: For Rent - Home Lease. Sum of total values divided by the number of values observed.

selectedAttributes.name: for_rent_home_lease_medianprice
selectedAttributes.title: Median Price (Rental)
selectedAttributes.description: For Rent - Home Lease. Middle value in a range of values, 50th percentile rank of the data set, arranged from lowest to highest.

selectedAttributes.name: sold_both_auction_private_treaty_medianprice
selectedAttributes.title: Median Price (Sold)
selectedAttributes.description: Sold - Both Auction & Private Treaty. Middle value in a range of values, 50th percentile rank of the data set, arranged from lowest to highest.

selectedAttributes.name: sold_both_auction_private_treaty_geometricmeanprice
selectedAttributes.title: Geometric Mean Price (Sold)
selectedAttributes.description: Sold - Both Auction & Private Treaty. The n'th root product of 'n' values.
